name: Adventure Platform Time
description:
This is a game that was created during module 1 of the Unity Video Game Programming Diploma, taught at the Miyagi Dev Dojo, in October 2022. Work continues on the game, and it is expected to reach 15 minutes of play.

Este es un juego que fue creado durante el módulo 1 del Diplomado de Programación de Videojuegos en Unity, impartido en el Miyagi Dev Dojo, en octubre de 2022. Se sigue trabajando en el juego, y se espera llegar a los 15 minutos de juego.

Special thanks to the free asset creators I used:

https://lhteam.itch.io/finn-spritehttps://grafxkid.itch.io/seasonal-tilesetshttps://ansimuz.itch.io/adventure-music-collection-pack-1https://dagurasusketch.itch.io/retrosoundshttps://dai420.itch.io/public-bus

Disclaimer: This game is created for educational and non-profit purposes only. The rights to the character are owned by Cartoon Network and/or Warner Bros.
